data.name: Video Horror Society - ULTRAFAN Founders Pack
data.detailed_description:
A super mega ultra deal for a super mega ULTRAFAN! Join the Video Horror Society to earn some serious fan rewards: Collectible Cosmetics, Limited Edition Movies, and the most Fanbux to drive a fan nuts. Dare to go beyond the movies. Become a Founding Fan today!

ULTRAFAN Founder’s Pack includes:
The complete SUPERFAN Founder's Pack PLUS…
The complete MEGAFAN Founder's Pack PLUS PLUS…

Exclusive Cosmetics:
Automatically unlock ultra cool Video Horror Society merch
  • First Edition Club BackPack and Digital Watch
  • Origins of Evil Trait for Werewolf, WART, and Dollmaster
  • Origins of Evil Trait for ALL Future Monsters
  • ULTRA Sticker Set for Teens
  • ULTRA Sticker Set for Monsters
  • ULTRAFAN Portrait
  • 1500 Fanbux

PLUS PLUS PLUS The Complete Collection of Limited Edition Movies:
Play to unlock ultra exclusive lore, cosmetics, and Fanbux rewards!

Spectral Collectors ULTRACUT:
  • Stage 3 ULTRA Spectra-Suit Costume
  • Spectraplasmic Goo Gun Flamethrower
  • Spectral Strut Emote
  • ULTRAFAN Movie Tshirt, Stickers, and Account Portrait
  • PLUS 1750 Fanbux!

Bonvini’s The Evil Never Dies ULTRACUT:
  • Malum’s Mark Upper Gear (Part 3 of 3) for all launch Monsters
  • Malum’s Mark Rage FX
  • ULTRAFAN Movie Tshirt, Stickers, and Account Portrait
  • PLUS 1750 Fanbux!

Become an ULTRAFAN today!
*Limited Edition Movies will unlock upon official game release and will never expire

data.short_description: A super mega ultra deal for a super mega ULTRAFAN! Join the Video Horror Society to earn some serious fan rewards: Collectible Cosmetics, Limited Edition Movies, and the most Fanbux to drive a fan nuts. Dare to go beyond the movies. Become a Founding Fan today!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit Operating System
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4170 or AMD FX-8120
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11 Compatible GeForce GTX 470 1GB or AMD HD 6850 1GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DX11 Compatible
  • Additional Notes: With these requirements, it is recommended that the game is played on Low quality settings.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit Operating System
  • Processor: Intel i5 6600K (3.5Ghz) or AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 780 (3GB) or AMD Radeon 7870 (2GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DX11 Compatible
  • Additional Notes: With these requirements, it is recommended that the game is played on Medium quality settings.
